description: This file demonstrates user-level knowledge filtering in a document processing system, including loading documents with metadata, applying filters during knowledge base queries, and illustrating different filtering strategies with an example using an Agent class.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: Database interface for LanceDB used for vector storage.

classes.name: DocxKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base class for managing DOCX documents with associated metadata.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Main class for handling queries and responses with knowledge filtering capabilities.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Function to download sample DOCX files with metadata for testing.
